snippet: A day after his drubbing of the Republican field, Mitt Romney assailed the angry attacks about his work for Bain Capital and urged his opponents to settle on what he called a “new course.”

byline.contributor: Trip Gabriel contributed reporting from Rock Hill, S.C.

lead_paragraph: A day after his drubbing of the Republican field, Mitt Romney assailed the angry attacks about his work for Bain Capital and urged his opponents to settle on what he called a “new course.”

headline.seo: Romney Warns Foes to Scale Back Attacks
headline.main: Romney Says N.H. Results Show Attacks on Him Failed
headline.print_headline: Romney Warns Foes to Scale Back Attacks
